column1: Smoque BBQ////I went to Smoque a few years ago and was underwhelmed
column2: but upon my latest visit (about a week ago)
column3: I was blown away.  We waited about half an hour in line before getting our food and were tempted to go somewhere else.  I am so glad we didn't because the food was amazing.  My husband and I ordered a lot -- the brisket and pulled pork sandwiches
column6: cornbread and peach cobbler.  Each and every dish was absolutely amazing.  There's really nothing more to say.  This is the only place that rivals Fat Willy's
column8: and I've been to most of the BBQ joints on the North Side.
